value:
What would the 7th Platoon think
if they saw me like this? Luke would
be first to tease me, no doubt...

People used to tell me how much
I resemble Marth. It used to feel
strange, but now I'm proud of it.

I tried to talk with Katarina, but she
said she wasn't sure where to look
when she was talking to me...$k$pI can't say I don't have the
same problem...

I was hesitant about this Plegian garb
at first, but I've grown to like it... Why
don't you try some on yourself?

Are all the women in Plegia as...
bewitching as Tharja?

I'm Kris, royal guard of Altea.
I've brought a gift for you,
$Nu!

Who we face will make no difference!
We will win. I swear it on my honor as
a knight of Altea.

Simply changing clothes can make
quite the difference in how one feels.
Hm... I feel like...an assassin!

My grandfather once told me, "It's
better to do something than to just
sit there letting your feet get cold."$k$pOn that note, I'll be right back!
I'm going for a quick run.
Thank you. This must have been fate.

I'm Kris, a knight of Altea. Oh, um...
These clothes have nothing to do
with Altea. It's just for a mission.

Perhaps I'm having a little too much
fun in this unfamiliar garb... I'm only
wearing it for a mission, after all.$k$pI mean, everyone tells me it looks
good on me. And I know Katarina
is looking beautiful as well...$k$pEr, wait—that's not what I wanted
to talk about!$k$pI was once told that I bore a strange
destiny... Perhaps you can relate?$k$pHave you maybe felt unseen eyes
gazing at you from the heavens?
Or from the depths of the sea?$k$pWhat role fate plays in life, I can't say,
but...I believe my choices have been
my own. That means something.$k$pI thought, if anyone could, you would
understand that feeling... And so we
ought to aid each other from here on!
せやっ
いくぞ！
ぐっ
まさか…！
How's this!
You're finished!
Intolerable!
Prepare yourself!
Apologies...
Haha
So this is the desert style of Plegia... How do I look?
Don't startle me! I am in no mood.
All right, I'm dressed. Now, what should I be doing?
Ah! These clothes should be well-suited to desert combat.
Even in the hottest desert, I will protect Prince Marth!
Curses are truly frightening. I have no use for them.
I care not where we are. I will protect you.
At your service.
Hm.
I will not fail.
